import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { RestaurantsContext } from '../context/RestaurantsContext'; import Review from './elements/Review' import SmallReview from './elements/SmallReview' import Navigator from './Navigator' import ReviewsPageModal from './ReviewsPageModal'; function RestaurantDetailHeader({restaurant_name, rating, review_count, review1, review2}) { const {userName, setUserName} = useContext(RestaurantsContext); // console.log(userName); const [trig, setTrig] = useState(false); let history = useHistory(); const logout = (e) => { // e.preventDefault() localStorage.removeItem("token") toast.success("Logged out successfully!") history.push('/'); } return (
